Summary: Observed a dot in the sky which was flashing
trends: There have been 22 other sightings in Lancaster
There were no other sightings in Lancaster on or around October 11th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsThe witness observed the event from the back of the residence. It appeared as a dot in the sky. It was located in a Northwest direction from the residence. The object was first observed when the witness entered the family vehicle and attempted to retrieve an item on the dashboard of the car. The object was observed through the windshield as a red dot which was blinking alternating from bright to dim. It appeared to be very far away. The object did not appear to be moving. The position of the object was at a 45 degree angle in the sky. After observing the object for two minutes the witness came inside to try to get corroboration of the event from other family members. This took approximately ten seconds. When he returned to the car the object was gone.
